_GEng_Sprite_PosSet.documentation: Set the position of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_PosSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_PosSet(ByRef $hSprite, $x = Default, $y = Default)

_GEng_Sprite_SizeSet.documentation: Set the size of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_SizeSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_SizeSet(ByRef $hSprite, $w = Default, $h = Default)

params.label: $w
params.documentation:
new size width
	*If <= 0*, set to current assigned Image Object Size

params.label: $h
params.documentation:
new size height
	*If <= 0*, set to current assigned Image Object Size

_GEng_Sprite_OriginSet.documentation: Set the origin point of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_OriginSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_OriginSet(ByRef $hSprite, $x = Default, $y = Default)

params.label: $x
params.documentation: *Sprite Relative* coordinates of the origin point

params.label: $y
params.documentation: *Sprite Relative* coordinates of the origin point

_GEng_Sprite_OriginSetEx.documentation: Set the origin point of a Sprite Object, to some specifique presets (most commons)
_GEng_Sprite_OriginSetEx.label: _GEng_Sprite_OriginSetEx(ByRef $hSprite, $eOrigin)

params.label: $eOrigin
params.documentation:
On of the following Enums:
* $GEng_Origin_Mid = Middle
* $GEng_Origin_TL = Top Left
* $GEng_Origin_TR = Top Right
* $GEng_Origin_BL = Bottom Left
* $GEng_Origin_BR = Bottom Right

_GEng_Sprite_AngleOriginSet.documentation: Specify the angular origin of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleOriginSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_AngleOriginSet(ByRef $hSprite, $iAngle)

_GEng_Sprite_SpeedSet.documentation: Set the speed, and the max speed of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_SpeedSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_SpeedSet(ByRef $hSprite, $x = Default, $y = Default, $max = Default)

_GEng_Sprite_SpeedAdd.documentation: Add values to the actual speed of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_SpeedAdd.label: _GEng_Sprite_SpeedAdd(ByRef $hSprite, $x = 0, $y = 0)

_GEng_Sprite_AccelSet.documentation: Set the acceleration of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AccelSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_AccelSet(ByRef $hSprite, $x = Default, $y = Default)

_GEng_Sprite_AccelAdd.documentation: Add values to the actual acceleration of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AccelAdd.label: _GEng_Sprite_AccelAdd(ByRef $hSprite, $x = 0, $y = 0)

_GEng_Sprite_InnertieSet.documentation: Set the innertia of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_InnertieSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_InnertieSet(ByRef $hSprite, $value)

_GEng_Sprite_AngleSet.documentation: Set the angle of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_AngleSet(ByRef $hSprite, $iAngle)

_GEng_Sprite_AngleAdd.documentation: Add a value to the actual angle of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleAdd.label: _GEng_Sprite_AngleAdd(ByRef $hSprite, $iAngle = 0)

params.label: $iAngle
params.documentation: Value to add (in degrees), can be + or -

_GEng_Sprite_AngleSpeedSet.documentation: Set the rotation (angular) speed, and the max rotation speed
_GEng_Sprite_AngleSpeedSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_AngleSpeedSet(ByRef $hSprite, $iAngle = Default, $iMax = Default)

params.label: $iMax
params.documentation: Max rotation speed (0 for no limit)

_GEng_Sprite_AngleSpeedAdd.documentation: Add a value to the actual rotation speed of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleSpeedAdd.label: _GEng_Sprite_AngleSpeedAdd(ByRef $hSprite, $iAngle = 0)

_GEng_Sprite_AngleAccelSet.documentation: Set the rotation (angular) acceleration of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleAccelSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_AngleAccelSet(ByRef $hSprite, $iAngle = Default)

_GEng_Sprite_AngleAccelAdd.documentation: Add a value to the actual angular acceleration of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_AngleAccelAdd.label: _GEng_Sprite_AngleAccelAdd(ByRef $hSprite, $iAngle = 0)

_GEng_sprite_AngleInnertieSet.documentation: Set the angular innertia of a Sprite Object
_GEng_sprite_AngleInnertieSet.label: _GEng_sprite_AngleInnertieSet(ByRef $hSprite, $iAngle = Default)

_GEng_Sprite_ColorMatrixTranslate.documentation: Change the color components of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_ColorMatrixTranslate.label: _GEng_Sprite_ColorMatrixTranslate(ByRef $hSprite, $fRed = 0, $fGreen = 0, $fBlue = 0, $fAlpha = 0)

params.label: $fRed
params.documentation: Percents to add/sub for the RED component (0 to 1.0)

params.label: $fGreen
params.documentation: Percents to add/sub for the GREEN component (0 to 1.0)

params.label: $fBlue
params.documentation: Percents to add/sub for the BLUE component (0 to 1.0)

params.label: $fAlpha
params.documentation: Percents to add/sub for the ALPHA component (transparency) (0 to 1.0)

_GEng_Sprite_ColorMatrixReset.documentation: Reset the colors of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_ColorMatrixReset.label: _GEng_Sprite_ColorMatrixReset(ByRef $hSprite)
